模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Controller

类 GameController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class is a controller class for game.fxml file to achieve MVC pattern.

The GameController let the player to choose the hero appearance and store it in DataManager.setHeroImage(Image), displays the InteractableWorld in gamePane, add timeline to InteractableWorld.updateWorld() to show animation, controls the keyboard events of Hero, and pop-up a high score board when DataManager.getLives() returns 0.
